casebody.data:
BEVERLY ENTERPRISES, INC., et al., petitioners,
v.
Donna PING, Executrix of the Estate of Alma Calhoun Duncan, Deceased. No. 12-652. Supreme Court of the United States April 22, 2013.

*1997Motion of Extendicare Health Services, Inc., et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Kentucky denied.
